content: of 18 stuff making sure to get toe area stuffed well leave about a half inch of space at the top of the leg unstuffed use tail to sew top closed with the toes pointing forward cut additional strand of yarn paw color to stitch through/over toe area three times pulling tight to create his toes i did two wraps for each toe stitch weave ends in well so that the toe stitches stay tight sew to sides just under the neck at a bit of an angle back legs - make 2 in white 1 single_crochet 6 into magic_ring 2 increase around 12 3 increase single_crochet around 18 4 increase single_crochet 2 arounf 24 5 increase single_crochet 3 around 30 6-8 single_crochet around 3r of 30 9 decrease x6 single_crochet 18 24 10 decrease x6 single_crochet 12 18 11-17 single_crochet around slip_stitch into next fo leave tail for sewing 7r of 18 stuff making sure to get toe area stuffed well cut additional strand of yarn paw color to stitch through/over toe area three times pulling tight to create his toes i did two wraps for each toe stitch weave ends in well so that the toe stitches stay tight sew to front sides so that the back paws rest under the front paws tail - in white - stuff as you go 1 single_crochet 6 into magic_ring 2-4 single_crochet 6 3r of 6 5-10 increase single_crochet into the rest - you will be adding one single_crochet to each round ending with 12 single_crochet in round 10 11-15 single_crochet around 5r of 12 16 single_crochet 3 decrease single_crochet 5 increase single_crochet 12 17-21 single_crochet around 5r of 12 slip_stitch into next fo leave tail for sewing ears - make 2 in white - i used a slightly thinner yarn for the ears to make them a little less stiff 1 single_crochet 6 into magic_ring 2-5 increase single_crochet into the rest - you will be adding one single_crochet to each round ending with 10sc on round 5 6 increase single_crochet 4 increase single_crochet 4 12 7 increase single_crochet 3 around 15 8 single_crochet around 15 9 increase single_crochet 4 around 18 10-11 single_crochet around 2r of 18 12 increase single_crochet 2 around 24 13-14 single_crochet around 2r of 24 slip_stitch into next fo leave tail for sewing sew ears to sides of head closer to the top at a slight angle with the bottom being at about round 12 large eye patch/mask - light brown - chain at beginning does not count as first stitch 1 ch14 slip_stitch to join ch1 2 increase x4 single_crochet 10 18 3 increase single_crochet 2 around 24 4 ch1 turn single_crochet 12 this row begins the top of the piece 5 ch1 turn increase single_crochet to the end 18 6 ch1 turn decrease x2 single_crochet 3 increase single_crochet 3 increase single_crochet 6 18 7 ch1 turn slip_stitch 6 half_double_crochet-increase x3 half_double_crochet 3 single_crochet 3 12 not counting slip_stitch s 8 ch1 turn skip first
